CONSUMER RIGHT

As whenever we hear this term, we get an idea that it must be specifically dealt in just court of laws or corporations where only white-collar officials get some remedy or where only the people on higher post get some relief as it to be a fancy term. But, that’s not the case here, and to understand it in a better way we can break the term and try to understand it in a better way.

item.title: Understanding Consumer Rights in India
item.description:
Understanding Consumer Rights in India

Imagine this scenario, you save up your pocket money to buy a brand new smartphone. After just a week of use, the screen stops working. When you go back to the shop, the seller refuses to replace it. What do you do? This is exactly why consumer rights exist in India. The Consumer Protection Act, 2019 is like your legal shield that protects you from such unfair situations. Let’s explore this important topic in detail so you can become a smart and informed consumer.
